Title: Object: Holy Family
Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; pastoral landscape with the Holy Family resting at the foot of a rock at right, angels above, mountains in the distance at left; after Cornelis van Poelenburgh. 1774 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: John Pye, the elder
Associated names: Associated with: John Stuart, 3rd Earl of Bute
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
